Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing a biotechnology credit against the general corporation tax, and the unincorporated business tax.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing a biotechnology credit against the general corporation tax, and the unincorporated business tax.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing a biotechnology credit against the general corporation tax, and the unincorporated business tax.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Providing a biotechnology credit against the general corporation tax, and the unincorporated business tax.
